data.name: Movavi Video Suite 2022 - Technology Set
data.detailed_description:
The future is now. Create projects about innovative trends with futuristic transitions and backgrounds. Add animated stickers to user guides to make the information really clear. Enhance your videos with smart titles and unique music tracks.

In this set you’ll find:

  • 70 titles
  • 26 stickers
  • 22 backgrounds
  • 30 transitions
  • 12 audio files

The DLC set is compatible with Movavi Video Suite 2022 Steam Edition.
data.about_the_game:
The future is now. Create projects about innovative trends with futuristic transitions and backgrounds. Add animated stickers to user guides to make the information really clear. Enhance your videos with smart titles and unique music tracks.

data.short_description: Feel like a hacker or a computer genius when you use the cyberpunk backgrounds and futuristic titles.

fullgame.name: Movavi Video Suite 2022 Steam Edition - Video Making Software: Video Editor Plus, Screen Recorder and Video Converter Premium

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/10/11 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible processor, 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 2000, NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8 and 8M, Quadro FX 4800, Quadro FX 5600, AMD Radeon™ R600, Mobility Radeon™ HD 4330, Mobility FirePro™ series, Radeon™ R5 M230 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280 × 768 screen resolution, 32-bit color
